title: *Brand new bathroom, down to the studs
posting_body: ['*Brand new bathroom, down to the studs.', 'Fresh paint in entire apartment.', 'New flooring throughout.', '* 1910 Apartment building on street of mansions across the street from large park and bike trail.', 'Absolute best location.', 'Inman Park Marta station is half a block away and many restaurants are in walking distance.', 'The Inman park festival <URL>) is set up on this street and the parade goes right in front of the building.', 'The unit is a studio with plenty of windows - great for natural light.', 'Cooling is by window unit a/c and heat is central gas.', 'There is a laundry building onsite.', 'The kitchen has room for an eat in table and the other room is living room/bedroom.', 'Brand new bathroom, down to the studs.', 'Water is an extra $50 per month per person.', 'Pet fee is a non-refundable $400 plus an extra $50/month Please contact via email']
